department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Intermediate Animation: Making an Animated Film: Studio Course
course.meeting_text: W., 1-5, and weekly film screenings F., 1-3.
course.description: This course offers returning animators a chance to extend and deepen skills and understanding of animation and to make a more substantial piece of work. Additional exercises encourage students to challenge themselves and explore a range of creative possibilities.
course.prerequisites: This class welcomes students with any previous animation/video/or filmmaking experience.
course.notes: //This course has an additional weekly film screening, Fridays, 1-3 pm.
